How can I find out which language version is currently generated by WML?

  • From: Hubertus Becker <nospam@thanx>
  • Date: Wed, 6 Jun 2001 23:02:23 +0200
Hi,

I want to implement on a multi-lingual page a feature to reach
several  languages of the same site follwing a link. Of course
the viewed site should not contain a link to itself. If've
experimented with the <lang:current>-Tag but it doesn't work.

How can I find out which language version is currently
generated by WML to exclude the self-link on the generated page?

Regards,

	Hubertus
